name: interlaminar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical between the curved parts at the back of a vertebra (= one of the bones in the back): interlaminar space an interlaminar injection
biology, engineering between thin layers or leaves: Interlaminar spaces divide the laminae into leaflets. inter-laminar damage to the structure Related word
lamina
More examplesFewer examplesThe midline interlaminar approach is used in lumbar regions because the spinous processes are less angulated there.We employ the interlaminar approach to direct the medication to the site of pain.The interlaminar approach is often used in pain management. When the operation is for disk disease, the interlaminar space is widened by removing the edges of the adjacent laminae.
